action.name: Multiattack
entries: The doppelganger makes two Slam attacks and uses Unsettling Visage if available.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6} (with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} during the first round of each combat), reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Unsettling Visage {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the doppelganger that can see the doppelganger. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

spellcasting.name: Read Thoughts
headerEntries: The doppelganger casts {@spell Detect Thoughts|XPHB}, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}).
